full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: Chromatography System
### Reference: cb-806-34537209

---

### Notice of Proposed Procurement
[23-58186]

**Chromatography System Acquisition**

The Human Health Therapeutics (HHT) portfolio at the National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking to acquire a chromatography system to meet the increasing demand from the Canadian biopharmaceutical industry for rapid process development and tech transfer to Contract Manufacturing Organizations (CMOs).

### Mandatory Technical Specifications
#### System Requirements
The delivered equipment must meet the following specifications:

* Modular design with flexibility to add/remove valves based on experiment requirements.
* Two metering type piston pumps for buffers with flow rate capacity of 0.001 to 25 ml/min.
* One metering type piston pump for sample loading with flow rate capacity of 0.001 to 25 ml/min.
* Pressure range: 0 to 20 MPa.
* Two buffer valves and one sample valve with minimum 7 inlets each.
* Column valve with 5 column ports and pre and post column pressure detectors.

#### Detection and Monitoring
* Multi-wavelength UV detector (190 to 700 nanometer) with ability to monitor three simultaneous wavelength.
* pH valve with integrated pH electrode with a pH reading range of 1-14.
* Conductivity monitor with integrated temperature sensor to correct for variations.

#### Delivery and Installation
The system must be delivered and installed at 6100, Royalmount Avenue, Montréal, Québec, H4P 2R2.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Revised World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

### Applicability of Trade Agreements
This procurement is exempt from the trade agreements due to technical reasons, including the need for interoperability with existing equipment.
